channel.title: Client wont work. ;s
channel.description:
Hey there. My friend is in china right now and was about to play a 525 server. He got this error when he launched the client.
[URL=http://img5.imageshack.us/i/fv9v28.png/][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/6726/fv9v28.th.png[/img][/URL]
Anyone know how to fix it? o.o
Thanks ~ Phail.

item.title: Client wont work. ;s
item.dc:creator: @Beastly1 Beastly¿
item.description:
@Beastly1 wrote:

Well by that error, either the server doesn’t let connections in from China, which I think is dumb, or the client is just messed up.

Can you try to tell us the contents of the Run.bat?

Right Click>Edit

Read full topic
